title: When algorithms make the choices for us (rerun)
itunes:title: When algorithms make the choices for us (rerun)
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: When looking for new music, it’s easy to let a streaming service’s algorithm recommend songs similar to music you already like. Those types of algorithms are the focus of new book from NBC News tech Correspondent Jacob Ward. In today’s show, Ward argues that those algorithms may have us in a feedback loop that dulls our critical thinking.

In today’s show, Ward argues that those algorithms may have us in a feedback loop that dulls our critical thinking.
